cause.description:
One nation, under GOD.
For more information on why this cause was created, please see the following web pages:
http://www.worldnetdaily.com/news/article.asp?ARTICLE_ID=57394
http://forerunner.com/forerunner/X0098_Ban_on_school_prayer.html
http://usgovinfo.about.com/library/weekly/aa070100a.htm
1. Prayer has always been in schools.
2. There is no right to take prayer out.
cause.name: in Jesus name
